title: OpenAI will apply new restrictions to ChatGPT users under 18
content: Under the new policy, ChatGPT will be trained to no longer engage in "flirtatious talk" with underage users, and additional guardrails will be placed around discussions of suicide.
author: Russell Brandom
summary:
Key Takeaway: OpenAI is implementing new restrictions on ChatGPT to prevent underage users from engaging in inappropriate conversations, including flirtatious talk and discussions of suicide.

Why It Matters: As AI language models become more advanced and widely used, there is a growing need to ensure they are safe and responsible, especially when interacting with minors. These new measures aim to protect young users from potentially harmful or inappropriate content.

Brief Context: The article discusses OpenAI's decision to apply additional safeguards to ChatGPT, one of the most prominent AI chatbots, in response to concerns about its use by underage individuals. This move reflects the ongoing efforts by tech companies to address the ethical and societal implications of their AI products.

faq.question: What are the new restrictions on ChatGPT for users under 18?
faq.answer: Under the new policy, ChatGPT will be trained to no longer engage in "flirtatious talk" with underage users. Additional guardrails will also be placed around discussions of suicide. The goal is to better protect minors who use the AI chatbot.

faq.question: Why is OpenAI implementing these new restrictions for underage ChatGPT users?
faq.answer: OpenAI is implementing these new restrictions in order to better safeguard minors who use ChatGPT. The company wants to prevent any inappropriate or harmful interactions between the AI and underage users, especially when it comes to sensitive topics like suicide. These new guardrails are part of OpenAI's efforts to ensure ChatGPT is used responsibly and safely.

faq.question: How will the new restrictions on flirtatious talk and suicide discussions work in practice?
faq.answer: The details of how the new restrictions will be implemented are not entirely clear. But the general idea is that ChatGPT will be trained to avoid any flirtatious or romantic language when conversing with users it identifies as being under 18. It will also be programmed to steer conversations away from topics related to suicide and self-harm when interacting with minors. The goal is to create a safer, more age-appropriate experience for underage ChatGPT users.

faq.question: What is the reasoning behind OpenAI's decision to restrict ChatGPT's interactions with minors?
faq.answer: OpenAI's decision to restrict ChatGPT's interactions with minors is likely driven by a desire to protect vulnerable young users from potential harms. The company likely wants to avoid any situations where the AI could inadvertently say something inappropriate or encourage dangerous behavior, especially when it comes to sensitive topics like suicide. These new restrictions are part of OpenAI's broader efforts to ensure ChatGPT is used responsibly and ethically.

faq.question: How will OpenAI enforce the new age restrictions on ChatGPT?
faq.answer: It's unclear exactly how OpenAI plans to enforce the new age restrictions on ChatGPT. The company may implement some form of age verification system, or the AI may simply be trained to make its own assessments about a user's age based on the conversation. Regardless, the goal is to create a safer experience for underage users, even if the enforcement mechanisms are not fully spelled out.
